text: Evan Balfour (born 9 September 1965) is a Scottish footballer, who played in the Scottish Football League for Airdrieonians and Ayr United. Balfour played for Airdrieonians in the 1992 Scottish Cup Final, which they lost 2–1 to Rangers. ==External links== * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Airdrieonians F.C.
